Package controller

Class DataVisualizationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.ColoredController
        • controller.DataVisualizationController

  • public class DataVisualizationController
extends ColoredController
    This class manages some events generated by the graphic elements present in the "DataVIsualizzation" view

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void closeWindow​(javafx.stage.WindowEvent window)
      Handler for the window closing event (useful for the proper functioning of the server)
      void init​(DataModel model, javafx.stage.Stage controlledStage)
      Builds an object instance of DataVisualizationController and initialize the attributes initializes a row factory such that each row of the table is assigned a color generated by the id of the cluster and also adds a handler for the window closing event (useful for the proper functioning of the server)
      void plotClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handler for the event generated by the click of the "Plot" button (create a piechart)
      void saveClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handler for the event generated by the click of the "Save" button (save the clusters in file)
      void updateTable​(boolean isLoadDB)
      Manages the request for clusters from file or the clustering of the data set from the db

      • init

        public void init​(DataModel model,
                 javafx.stage.Stage controlledStage)
        Builds an object instance of DataVisualizationController and initialize the attributes initializes a row factory such that each row of the table is assigned a color generated by the id of the cluster and also adds a handler for the window closing event (useful for the proper functioning of the server)
        Overrides:
        init in class Controller
        Parameters:
        model - the info of the client
        controlledStage - references to the stage of the window

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow​(javafx.stage.WindowEvent window)
        Handler for the window closing event (useful for the proper functioning of the server)
        Parameters:
        window - the event generated by window closing

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable​(boolean isLoadDB)
                 throws ServerException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        java.net.SocketException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Manages the request for clusters from file or the clustering of the data set from the db
        Parameters:
        isLoadDB - true if the data is load from db, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - Thrown to indicate that there is an error creating or accessing a Socket.
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when an application tries to load in a class through its string name
        ServerException - Thrown if there is something wrong with the communication with server
